name: mongo-rate-limit-store
description: Provides a Mongo store for the express-rate-limit middleware.

scripts.makeCodeCoverageDetailReport: nyc --all --exclude migrations --exclude coverage --exclude test --reporter lcov --reporter html  npm test -- --reporter dot && echo "*** Code coverage report done, checkout ./coverage dir"
scripts.makeCodeCoverageSummaryReport: nyc --all --exclude migrations --exclude coverage --exclude test --reporter text-summary npm test -- --reporter dot

author: Mert Şişmanoğlu <mertssmnoglu@gmail.com>
